migrate.achievementDesc:
You've successfully migrated your accounts. To thank you 
for completing the process, we're rewarding all your accounts 
(with at least one transaction made before December 2, 2019) 
with glowing avatars!

desc.almostFinish: To finish the migration of your accounts, accept the new Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy.
desc.enterPassword: Please enter your password from [waves.exchange](https://waves.exchange) to continue
desc.onePassword: Please create one password for all your accounts. Sign into accounts and switch between them easily.

description.enterPass: Wprowadź swoje hasło do konta lub
description.unlock: Odblokuj swoje konta. Możesz wrócić do tego kroku później.
description.unlockExchange: To finish the migration, please complete the authorization process by unlocking an account from the old application and signing in, or creating a new account, or importing it.

modalDesc.firstPart: To offer users a better experience and wider range of tools, we are moving from Waves DEX to [Waves Exchange](https://waves.exchange).
modalDesc.redirected: Please go there to complete the miration process.
modalDesc.secondPart: On December 2, 2019 Waves DEX will stop operating! To continue trading you have to move your accounts to Waves Exchange. We strongly recommend that you do this in advance.
modalDesc.thirdPart: The moving is fast, easy, and, of course, absolutely secure.

subtitle.pendingExchange: To unlock, select an account from the list
